author: _drinkcoffee
content:
**IEEE International Conference on Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (ICBC): Crosschain Workshop 2022**: Call for papers and speakers.
Crosschain Workshop has been accepted as a (the first) workshop of IEEE ICBC. The workshop has two tracks: Academic and Applications of Technology.  Please consider submitting a paper or a speaking proposal.
For more details: https://icbc2022.ieee-icbc.org/authors/call-workshop-papers-talks
